page.title: 10Local Newspaper stories.
page.content: The main stories from the local newspaper The herald Express on the 18th and 19th July 1985: "Hands off Goodrington" There was a public protest by local people to the proposed Â£13 million leisure complex to be built at Goodrington. "Joyriders in house crash" A car driven by joyriders crashed into a house at Shaldon.There were no injuries but there was considerable damage to the property. "Asda want Torbay site" The Asda Company might buy a 6 acre site in Torquay to build a superstore. "Cabbies raise over Â£650" Local taxi drivers raised Â£650 for the Live Aid famine in Ethiopia relief appeal by donating their morning takings.
